sn35.87:4.1: * Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn35.87:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmā ca channo gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanti.
sn35.87:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena yena āyasmā channo ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn35.87:4.4: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahācundo tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.87:4.7: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahācundo āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosi.
sn35.87:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo yenāyasmā channo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn35.87:5.3: Nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.87:5.4: “kacci te, āvuso channa, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.87:6.1: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo.
sn35.87:6.2: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
sn35.87:6.3: evameva kho, āvuso, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
sn35.87:6.4: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn35.87:6.6: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya;
sn35.87:6.7: evameva kho, āvuso, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
sn35.87:6.8: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn35.87:6.10: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya;
sn35.87:6.11: evameva kho adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.
sn35.87:6.12: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ … pe …
sn35.87:6.14: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṃ samparitāpeyyuṃ;
sn35.87:6.15: evameva kho, āvuso, adhimatto kāyasmiṃ ḍāho.
sn35.87:6.16: Na me, āvuso, khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo.
sn35.87:6.17: Satthaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, āharissāmi, nāvakaṅkhāmi jīvitan”ti.
sn35.87:7.2: Yāpetāyasmā channo, yāpentaṃ mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ icchāma.
sn35.87:7.3: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhojanāni pariyesissāmi.
sn35.87:7.4: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi sappāyāni bhesajjāni, ahaṃ āyasmato channassa sappāyāni bhesajjāni pariyesissāmi.
sn35.87:7.5: Sace āyasmato channassa natthi patirūpā upaṭṭhākā, ahaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi.
sn35.87:7.7: Yāpetāyasmā channo, yāpentaṃ mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ icchāmā”ti.
sn35.87:8.1: “Na me, āvuso sāriputta, natthi sappāyāni bhojanāni;
sn35.87:8.7: Api ca me, āvuso, satthā pariciṇṇo dīgharattaṃ manāpeneva, no amanāpena.
sn35.87:8.8: Etañhi, āvuso, sāvakassa patirūpaṃ yaṃ satthāraṃ paricareyya manāpeneva, no amanāpena.
sn35.87:8.9: ‘Anupavajjaṃ channo bhikkhu satthaṃ āharissatī’ti—
sn35.87:9.1: “Puccheyyāma mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ channaṃ kañcideva desaṃ, sace āyasmā channo okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
sn35.87:10.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi … pe …
sn35.87:10.2: jivhaṃ, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasi … pe …
sn35.87:10.3: manaṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.87:11.1: “Cakkhuṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi … pe …
sn35.87:11.2: jivhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi … pe …
sn35.87:11.3: manaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
sn35.87:12.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi …
sn35.87:12.2: jivhāya, āvuso channa, jivhāviññāṇe jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya jivhaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasi …
sn35.87:12.3: manasmiṃ, āvuso channa, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu kiṃ disvā kiṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.87:13.1: “Cakkhusmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya cakkhuṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi … pe …
sn35.87:13.2: jivhāya, āvuso sāriputta, jivhāviññāṇe jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya jivhaṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ jivhāviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmi … pe …
sn35.87:13.3: manasmiṃ, āvuso sāriputta, manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu nirodhaṃ disvā nirodhaṃ abhiññāya manaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassāmī”ti.
sn35.87:14.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.87:14.2: “tasmātiha, āvuso channa, idampi tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ niccakappaṃ sādhukaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ:
sn35.87:14.3: ‘*nissitassa calitaṃ, anissitassa calitaṃ natthi.
sn35.87:14.8: Cutūpapāte asati nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena.
sn35.87:15.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca mahācundo āyasmantaṃ channaṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
sn35.87:15.2: Atha kho āyasmā channo acirapakkantesu tesu āyasmantesu satthaṃ āharesi.
sn35.87:16.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.87:16.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.87:16.6: “Nanu te, sāriputta, channena bhikkhunā sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatā”ti?
sn35.87:16.7: “Atthi, bhante, pubbavijjanaṃ nāma vajjigāmo.
sn35.87:16.9: “Honti hete, sāriputta, channassa bhikkhuno mittakulāni suhajjakulāni upavajjakulāni.
sn35.87:16.10: Na kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, ettāvatā saupavajjoti vadāmi.
sn35.87:16.11: Yo kho, sāriputta, tañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, aññañca kāyaṃ upādiyati, tamahaṃ saupavajjoti vadāmi.
